name: Rocket Jump Frenzy
description:
You Deserve A Medal For That.




Rocket Jump Frenzy is a punishing platformer where you have to climb a mountain with nothing but a rocket launcher and a lot of will power. This game was heavily inspired by Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy and Team Fortress 2.
This game is intentionally difficult so don't expect forgiveness for your mistakes.

  • Explode your own feet.
  • Climb a mountain.
  • Fall.
  • Rage.
  • Repeat.
